version_description:
* Pass the new qualification races to show everyone how awesome you are in the unified ranked races and leaderboard!

* Easier to change your appearance - collect rider and bike style points that can be used for unlocking any type of style

* You can now check out the market and cases right after the qualification races! Time to satisfy that curiosity

*Get some sweet rewards from the brand new case! Don't forget to claim it as soon as you can

- Start collecting your new daily bonus - because we love you just for being you!

-Introducing: bundles! The quickest and most convenient way for you to get the items you want

- Prefer another language? You can now enjoy Dirt Xtreme in French, Russian and German

- We added loads of new personalized rider animations for you to have fun with!

- Seasons are coming to Dirt Xtreme! Make sure to work extra hard on the Ranked Races, as from now on you'll start getting Season rewards based on your rating!

- Who wants a Viking hat?? We added new awesome emojis for you to interact during races

- Balance tune

- Minor bug fixes and improvements

* Introducing new contests: keep close attention and make sure you never miss the new Event Races! They're only available once in a few hours, and offer AMAZING rewards to the participants. And check this out- the more you race, the bigger your reward!

* We're happy to release a whole new level pack! Who knew that the port of Grimsby can turn into such a massive dirt biking arena?

* New bike alert! Phobos is here to take you far far away, very very quickly

* Brand new outfits for your rider are now available! So don't forget to upgrade your style before the next match
